metadata.title: CVE-2018-14593 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 6.0.x through6.0.9, 5.0.x through 5.0.28, and 4.0.x through 4.0.30. An attacker who islogged into OTRS as an agent may escalate their privileges by accessing aspecially crafted URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14593` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.10-1
otrs2 - 6.0.10-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.10-1').
